item.title: About my thesis
item.description: PhD thesis There is an 1-year embargo on my thesis. It will be made available on HAL from 27th September, 2025. TeX template My thesis has been written using Overleaf. I simplified the document to build a template, so I hope one can easily build upon it. Find the template in Tools.

item.title: Welcome to my GitHub Pages !
item.description: I’ve been planning to build my GitHub Pages for a while - and I finally did it ! The current theme is: hugo-theme-relearn.
